items.title: Anthropic reaches $1.5 Billion settlement with authors in landmark copyright case
items.description: Anthropic’s deal with authors may accelerate a shift toward licensing copyrighted material needed to train AI models, legal experts say

items.title: Hundreds detained at Georgia’s top economic development project as immigration crackdown collides with U.S. manufacturing push
items.description: Immigration authorities detained 475 people, most of them South Koreans, during a raid on Hyundai's EV manufacturing site in Georgia.

items.title: Palantir CEO Alex Karp says U.S. labor workers won’t lose their jobs to AI—‘it’s not true’
items.description: The company has launched a new storytelling project Karp hopes will change the narrative around AI, and the CEO says it is one of his “biggest priorit...

items.title: How to watch Friday’s streaming-exclusive NFL game live online for free—and without cable
items.description: This season's Taylor Swift-watch gets underway.

items.title: Is the Fed ready to go big? Analysts debate jumbo rate cut after soft jobs data
items.description: A half-point cut is “now in play,” some analysts say.
